subject: Core antenna for 12-470 equals more raw audio?
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
I needed to boost my raw audio reception a bit, and I didn't like the 
12-470 antenna "as-is"... so I did what I like doing... I transformed 
it into something more practical.
See it here: http://www.ufogeek.com/?p=122

- Mike
